sentenceOrdering.japanese: 彼はすでに宿題を終えています。
sentenceOrdering.correctAnswer: He has already finished his homework.
sentenceOrdering.explanation: 正解は He has already finished his homework. です。alreadyの位置に注意します。
sentenceOrdering.passage: He studies every night. He has already finished his homework. Now he can relax and read a book.
sentenceOrdering.passageJapanese: 彼は毎晩勉強します。彼はすでに宿題を終えています。今は本を読んで休めます。

sentenceOrdering.japanese: 彼らは10年間ここに住んでいます。
sentenceOrdering.correctAnswer: They have lived here for ten years.
sentenceOrdering.explanation: 正解は They have lived here for ten years. です。for + 期間の語順です。
sentenceOrdering.passage: They moved here long ago. They have lived here for ten years. Many neighbors know them.
sentenceOrdering.passageJapanese: 彼らはずいぶん前にここへ引っ越しました。彼らは10年間ここに住んでいます。近所の人もよく知っています。

sentenceOrdering.japanese: 私はその本をすでに読み終えました。
sentenceOrdering.correctAnswer: I have already read the book.
sentenceOrdering.explanation: 正解は I have already read the book. です。現在完了の語順を確認します。
